languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля растерянно хрипит:{/n} "Запрос... не может быть удовлетворен. Омниссия даровал мне озарение, и я заставил увечного {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа машины{/g}, наполнявшего разум Тарзуса яростью... стать тише. Мне не в полной мере понятно, каким образом я воззвал к нему. Ситуация симметрично схожа с инцидентом, произошедшим на Райкаде Минорис, в ходе которого я обратился к духу машины неисправного механизма и даровал ему покой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля растерянно хрипит:{/n} "Запрос... не может быть удовлетворен. Омниссия даровал мне озарение, и я заставил увечного {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа машины{/g}, наполнявшего разум Тарзуса яростью... стать тише. Мне не в полной мере понятно, каким образом я воззвал к нему. Ситуация симметрично схожа с инцидентом, произошедшим на Райкад Минорис, в ходе которого я обратился к духу машины неисправного шаттла и даровал ему покой".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля растерянно хрипит:{/n} "Запрос... не может быть удовлетворен. Омниссия даровал мне озарение, и я заставил увечного {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа машины{/g}, наполнявшего разум Тарзуса яростью... стать тише. Мне не в полной мере понятно, каким образом я воззвал к нему. Ситуация симметрично схожа с инцидентом, произошедшим на Райкаде Минорис, в ходе которого я обратился к духу машины неисправного механизма и даровал ему покой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps confusedly,{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I made the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus' mind with fury... become quieter. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning shuttle and put it at rest."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

languages.text: {n}パスカルの混乱した返答がヴォクスからガラガラ声で流れる。{/n}「要求を実行…することは…できません。万機神は自分にひらめきを与え、そして自分はターザスの精神を怒りで埋めていた負傷した{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を…停止させました。自分は嘆願のやり方を完全に理解してはいません。この状況は自分が機械精霊に機能不全のシャトルのことを訴え休ませたライカド・ミノリスの事件と酷似しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの混乱した返答がヴォクスからガラガラ声で流れる。{/n}「要求を実行…することは…できません。万機神は自分にひらめきを与え、そして自分はターザスの精神を怒りで埋めていた負傷した{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を…停止させました。自分は嘆願のやり方を完全に理解してはいません。この状況は自分が機械精霊に機能不全のシャトルのことを訴え休ませたライカド・ミノリスの事件と酷似しています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音嘶哑，听起来很迷惑。{/n}“无法……履行……请求。欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我顿悟，我让塔祖斯心中充满了怒火的残缺{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}……安静了下来，但我并没有完全理解我向机魂呼吁的方式。这次的情况与小莱卡德的情况一模一样。当时，我也是像这样，向发生故障的机魂发出了我无法理解的呼吁，让它得到了安息。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的嘶哑的声音听起来很迷惑。{/n}“无法……履行……请求。欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我顿悟，我让塔祖斯心中充满了怒火的残缺{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}……安静下来，但我并没有完全理解我向机魂呼吁的方式。这次的情况与小莱卡德的情况一模一样。当时，我也是像这样，向发生故障的穿梭机机魂发出了我无法理解的呼吁，让它得到了安息。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals verwirrte Antwort dringt krächzend aus seinem Vox:{/n} "Kann Anfrage ... nicht ... bearbeiten. Der Omnissiah gewährte mir eine Erleuchtung, und ich habe den verstümmelten {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g}, der Tarzus' Geist mit Zorn erfüllte ... verstummen lassen. Ich verstehe nicht ganz, warum ich Einfluss auf ihn hatte. Die Situation entspricht genau dem Vorfall auf Rykad Minoris, als ich den Maschinengeist eines defekten Mechanismus zur Ruhe gebettet habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme krächzt verwirrt.{/n} "Kann Anfrage ... nicht ... bearbeiten. Der Omnissiah gewährte mir eine Erleuchtung, und ich habe den verstümmelten {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g}, der Tarzus' Geist mit Zorn erfüllte ... ruhiger gemacht. Ich verstehe nicht ganz, warum ich Einfluss auf ihn hatte. Die Situation entspricht genau dem Vorfall auf Rykad Minoris, als ich den Maschinengeist eines defekten Shuttles zur Ruhe gebracht habe."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal répond d'une voix rauque et bégaye :{/n} « Réponse... introuvable. L'Omnimessie m'a accordé une révélation, et j'ai fait taire l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} qui communiquait sa fureur à Tarzus. Si les tenants et aboutissants de mon geste m'échappent, cette situation reflète en tout point l'incident survenu sur Rykad Minoris, quand je suis entré en contact avec l'esprit de la machine d'un mécanisme défaillant afin de le neutraliser. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal répond d'une voix rauque et bégaye :{/n} « Réponse... introuvable. L'Omnimessie m'a accordé une révélation, et je me suis arrangé pour que l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} qui communiquait sa fureur à Tarzus... se taise enfin. Si les tenants et aboutissants de mon geste m'échappent, cette situation reflète en tout point l'incident survenu sur Rykad Minoris, quand je suis entré en contact avec l'esprit de la machine d'une navette défaillante afin de le neutraliser. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal manifiesta su confusión con voz áspera.{/n} «Imposible... cumplir... la solicitud. El Omnissiah me ha otorgado una epifanía, y he... silenciado al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} tullido que inundaba de furia la mente de Tarzus. No acabo de entender cómo he conseguido llegar a él. La situación es exactamente la misma que durante el incidente en Rykad Minoris, donde apelé al espíritu máquina de un mecanismo averiado y logré apaciguarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}El vocosintetizador de Pasqal manifiesta su confusión con voz áspera.{/n} «Imposible... cumplir... la solicitud. El Omnissiah me ha otorgado una epifanía, y he... acallado al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} tullido que inundaba de furia la mente de Tarzus. No acabo de entender cómo he conseguido llegar a él. La situación es exactamente la misma que durante el incidente en Rykad Minoris, donde apelé al espíritu máquina de una lanzadera averiada y logré apaciguarlo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın muğlak yanıtı, voksundan gıcırdayarak çıkıyor.{/n} "Talep... Yerine... Getirilemiyor. Hermesih bana bir aydınlanma bahşetti, ben de... Tarzus'un zihnini öfkeyle dolduran yaralı {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhunu{/g}... Susturdum. Bu olaya çekilme biçimimi tam olarak anlamamaktayım. Bu durum, Rykad Minoris'te arızalı bir mekanizmayla iletişime geçip onu huzura kavuşturduğum olayla birebir örtüşüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's confused reply comes from his vox in a rasp:{/n} "Unable... to fulfil... request. The Omnissiah granted me an epiphany, and I... muted the maimed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} that was filling Tarzus's mind with fury. I do not fully understand the manner of my appeal to it. The situation perfectly mirrors the incident on Rykad Minoris where I appealed to the machine spirit of a malfunctioning mechanism and laid it to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın kafası karışık yanıtı voksundan gıcırdayarak çıkıyor:{/n} "Talep... Yerine... Getirilemiyor. Hermesih bana bir aydınlanma bahşetti ve ben de... Tarzus'un zihnini öfkeyle dolduran yaralı {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhu{/g}nu... Susturdum. Bu olaya çekilme biçimimi tam olarak anlamamaktayım. Bu durum, arızalı bir mekanizmayla iletişime geçtiğim ve onu huzura kavuşturduğum Rykad Minoris'teki olayla birebir örtüşüyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
